title: Silent Night
body:
My family has always been pretty biblical, and although I have never really considered myself christian, we still go church and pray before meals. Yesterday we did the usual, a bible scripture before we eat, one after and one before bed. I'm 17 and my two little shithead brothers are 14. They're twins. We all sleep in the same room, and i have to sleep on the other side of there beaten, crippled bunk bed. I don't get much sleep, and at first my family suspected insomnia was the reason but i have always just put it down to stress. Exams...colleges..etc. It was about 2 in the morning when i heard the whisper of a faint, light tapping. It was constant, almost rhythmic, like it had a place and purpose. I swiftly got out of my bed. I crept over to the noise and realised that it was coming from the wall. I slowly approached my baby blue, painted wall until i was close enough to put my ear against it.

Then It Stopped....

What followed was a roaring blast of light, almost ten seconds long, accompanied by a booming encore of the sound of a horn.

This is the best way i could describe it: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iole3n3yvpU

I don't remember what happened after that, only what happened after i woke up. strangely, i was resting on top of my bed. The sheets were clean, and the bed was made, almost as if i hadn't slept on them. Both of my brothers were gone, and my alarm clock was reset. I got out of bed, and started to put some clothes on. From what i could recall, it was a Sunday morning, which meant i had to put on all my shitty little 'smart' clothes on. I was about halfway through getting my buttons done until i remembered. Horror came upon my face, I HAD FORGOTTEN BREAKFAST!

I rushed downstairs, with an apology prepared for my mother. She hates waking me up and I probably missed breakfast. I swung open my living room door and shifted into the desolate kitchen. Nobody was home. I called out for any body, even my father (whom i had recently fallen out with) and i was left without an answer. Eventually, i started to reminisce on the night before, and remembered the horn, the light.

I sprinted out side, looking around for any body. I was scared, and i still am. I must have searched for hours, but nobody was home, nobody was at home. Its been about 30 hours since then, and I've just woken up. The noises, the light happen every hour or so. The electricity, water, hell even the WiFi works. I'm currently writing this on my laptop at home, the only place i can feel safe. A few hours ago i left the house to explore, try and find other people. Even wildlife has left the earth. Its just been.... left with silence. I eventually got to a shop, and decided to eat, finally. It was then when i noticed weird things were going on. Things were changing, food was being restocked when i wasn't looking. The time on the clocks were moving, but in completely random and distorted ways. Even i was changing, my hair colour is now a shade darker, and my freckles are gone. Where am I? Who am I? Were you me, am i you?

The horn is blown again, and darkness follows. Its a Silent Night.
author: CronicNS
